Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1975...
Traded from Plum Grove to Pontiac on 7/13/1976 (Going to PG: 2B J. Sterns. Going to PON: LF A. Cid, 2B R. Arledge)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/24/1979, off Gary Chichester (WT)...
Injured on 6/23/1979 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 7-8 weeks...
Injured on 6/3/1983 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 3/1/1987 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 3/1/1988 to a minor league contract.
Hit first career homerun on 9/3/1988, off Ebby Calvin LaLoosh (SYR)...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 3/1/1989 to a minor league contract.
Released by Bay City on 6/16/1989...
